item.title: Hashire Hebereke: EX delayed to spring 2026
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/04/hashire-hebereke-ex-delayed-to-spring-2026

  • PC
  • Switch

No longer due out in 2025.

Publisher Gravity Game Arise and developer SUNSOFT have delayed Hashire Hebereke: EX from its previously planned 2025 release window to spring 2026. It will be available for Switch and PC via Steam.

SUNSOFT will live stream in-development gameplay from the alpha version of the game on April 3 from 20:00 to 21:00 JST, including a look at four-player local multiplayer. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

As previously detailed, Hashire Hebereke: EX is a modern remake of the 1994-released Super Famicom racing action game Hashire Hebereke by SUNSOFT. Players can choose from comical and cute characters like series protagonist Hebe and partake in extreme races across unique stages. While carrying over elements from the original game, it will add a new Time Attack mode, new characters, and new stages, as well as four-person online multiplayer support.
